Primary Contact: Michelle Wingfield, Community Administrator; Email: mwingfield@vantageliving.ca
Volunteer Coordinator: Brandt's Creek Mews; Phone: 778.478.8800; Fax: 778.478.8801; Email: bcmadmin@vantageliving.ca
Service Details: - Provides residential care community home for 102 older adults who require 24 hour nursing care.- Services for residents include a General Store which offers residents the opportunity to shop for toiletries, gifts and sweets, as well as a Hair salon, library, Bistro lounge for residents and families to relax, socialize and have coffee time. -General programming includes but not limited to gardening, exercises, crafts, Mens Group, Travel Club, Bistro Socials, Baking, Cards, Shuffleboard, Games, as well as Therapeutic Recreation Programs.-Spiritual Care fellowship from Trinity Baptist, St. Pius Catholic Church and Willow Park Church as well as Ladies Fellowship and Hymn Sing programs.
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - washrooms and entrance fully accessible * 1 handicapped parking stall
